name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts Remix: Queen Edition
summary: Ghouls 'n Ghosts Remix: Queen Edition is a remake of Ghouls 'n Ghosts Remix where you play as Guinevere.

name: Ghastly Goodies
summary: It's Halloween, and that means candy! Play as Pete or Sarah, and try to avoid the tricks as you gather some treats!

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Deluxe Edition
summary: Tokyo's population has vanished, and deadly supernatural forces prowl the streets. Use an arsenal of elemental abilities to unravel the truth behind the disappearance and save Tokyo.

name: Gharp
summary: Pranga is a stealth-focused first person shooter game about sneaking into a terrorist organisation to prevent an attack.

name: Ghost Tokyo
summary: This game is about surviving in a randomly generated city, finding food supplies, fighting zombies, while keeping yourself warm. Try to survive as much days as you can!

name: Ghost Castle
summary: Defeat the ghosts who live in the castle! Make full use of the ninja weapons and skills to aim for the top floor where the ghost boss Yamatanoorochi is! Weapons such as shurikens, bombs and swords, and skills such as fire and freeze will surely help. Keep the peace of the village!

name: Ghost College: Hotel Fright - Chapter 1
summary: The strange death of a roommate, the sudden "friendly" Mr. Wang, as well as the out-of-place hotel, so that the ghost college has new clues, as well as a new mystery, has been chasing the female ghost, what is hidden behind, with the passage of time, everything is gradually clear

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Prelude: The Corrupted Casefile
summary: Join KK and his gang of supernatural detectives as they investigate a strange disappearance, only to stumble upon something more sinister. A visual novel prequel to Ghostwire: Tokyo.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed
summary: An all-ages take on its brand of four-versus-one asymmetric multiplayer games, where you play as your own original Ghostbusters team — or take on the role of a ghost hellbent on wreaking haunted havoc.

name: Ghoul Castle 3D: Gold Edition
summary: This is a simple old school dungeon crawler. It's made completely by one person - me, who is a fan of dark fantasy games, adventures, dungeons and dragons! Gold Edition means the game is complete with all additional features and items. It also offers new in-game economy based on the gold you collect

name: Ghosts of Hollow Creek
summary: A fantasy story-rich turn-based RPG with customizable characters and romantic interest.

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
summary: This is about a talented girl "Lasling" with excellent working ability, became a ghost after an accidental death, and meets the only person in the world who can see and touch her --"Mofft", a story of love and parting.

name: Ghostbusters VR
summary: Strap on your proton pack and Quest 2 and step into the world of Ghostbusters in immersive virtual reality. Start your Ghostbusters HQ in a new city, San Francisco, and solve a deep mystery across a new chapter in the Ghostbusters universe.

name: Ghost Stories
summary: You play the part of a Taoist monk with supernatural powers. Your final goal: vanquish Wu-Feng, the wicked Lord of Darkness. In Ghost Stories, the forces of good won't get a break – the ghosts will attack you unceasingly. You'll have to team up to repel the attack of the ghosts, zombies and other abominations under Wu-Feng's command. Be stronger and more clever than Evil and the village will be saved. Will you be brave enough to vanquish Wu-Feng and his minions?

name: Ghostlight Melancholia
summary: Ghostlight Melancholia is a retro horror first person mystery solving game, where you find out what connects the four ghostlights, the evil that is after them and the secrets behind it all.

name: Ghostwriters & Co.
summary: Welcome to Ghostwriters & Co. You're looking for a job, so you've come here. You're not much of a writer, but you ARE a ghost. Hopefully they'll have some job you can do!

name: Ghostware: Arena of the Dead
summary: Ghostware is a retro-fps combining the lore-heavy plot and exploration of adventure games with the fast action of '90s shooters. You and other ghosts have been trapped inside an arena FPS created by a wizard's unwillingness to overcome his nostalgia. Escape the past, shoot your way out.

name: Ghosts of Tabor
summary: Ghosts of Tabor is a VR only FPS PVP and PVE survival game where you will use your wits, skills and resources to survive. Inspired by games such as Escape from Tarkov and DayZ, featuring different scenarios from scavenging to looting and crafting. Will you survive long enough to make it out alive?

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
summary: This is a story of Lasling, a talented genius teenage girl with amazing working abilities, who becomes a ghost after an accident. The only person in the world she is visible to is Mofft, the male main protagonist. Their meeting is as if a fateful encounter and love story begins.

name: Ghostwriter Hatate-chan
summary: A doujin game by ISY based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Ghostrunner: Complete Edition
summary: Adapt, overcome and kill in the challenging but rewarding Ghostrunner: Complete Edition, the ultimate Ghostrunner experience, which includes the critically acclaimed Ghostrunner, Project _Hel expansion and all cosmetic packs.

name: Ghost Trap
summary: You've died and landed in purgatory, your options? Unending suffering or finding a way back to your world.

name: G.H.O.S.T. Chronicles: Phantom of the Faire
G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor
Ghost Scramble
summary: A action game from XFLAG Development in Japan

name: Ghostbusters: The Video Game
summary:
The Ghostbusters are back for an all new adventure. With Manhattan overrun again by supernatural creatures, gamers take the role of a new recruit joining the famous Ghostbusters team. Equipped with a variety of unique equipment and gadgets, players hunt, fight and wrangle a wide range of ghosts in an all-new battle to save New York City from its latest paranormal plague.

Delivering a special gaming experience to the tremendous Ghostbusters fan base around the world, Ghostbusters: The Video Game features the original cast from Columbia Pictures' classic Ghostbusters films, including Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis and Ernie Hudson - together again for the first time in over 20 years. Supporting the original Ghostbusters crew are the talents of Annie Potts, Brian Doyle Murray and William Atherton.

Like the films before it, Ghostbusters: The Video Game is all-new classic adventure with Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis returning to the helm to script and create a new storyline that leads gamers through the trials and tribulations of the world's leading paranormal ghost busting team. Players experience a variety of frightening new ghosts, even some based on ideas from Aykroyd and Ramis that never made it into the original feature films.

name: Ghostkeeper
summary: Ghostkeeper - the player controls a platform that can be moved by placing it under the bone, preventing it from falling on the skulls.

name: Ghost Puncher
summary: This is a beat'em up with influences from Guardian Heroes and Little Fighters 2, 3D hand-drawn environments, with anime-style characters and music composed exclusively for the game.

name: Ghostly Moans
summary: Spirits have been possessing people in the kingdom and a young priestess named Mia has become well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures. Follow her in search of the ones responsible for this situation.

name: Ghost Ship
summary: In Ghost Ship, you become an epidemic expert aboard the quarantined cruise ship, stranded in the open seas. No port will offer you shelter, as an unknown virus wreaks havoc among the crew and the passengers. Your job is to save their lives, but also save the world in the long run.

name: Ghostkin Capers
summary: Who could possibly spook the spooker? Feign your bravery as you uncover the secrets that lie in the haunted Manor; on an ultimate quest to help two boys.

name: Ghostland Yard
summary: Uncover the truth about the Ghostland Yard investigators disappearance in this challenging 2D precision platformer. Travel across the world in more than 250 hand-crafted levels to find your friends!

name: Ghost War
summary: An RPG about an alchemist that tries to find ghosts

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition
summary:
Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition includes:
- A replica case of the Tobin’s Spirit Guide
- An exclusive poster
- Stickers
- A display stand
- Advance Access to the Basher Ghost
- A rare Ectoplast Skin
- Ghostbusters RTV Kit Ghost Trap
- A special PKE Meter

name: Ghost Shadow
summary:
Single-player dynamic FPS with bright top AAA graphics, upgrade systems in steampunk style with psychedelic mechanics, puzzles, and horror elements.

You are an invincible cyborg, using frightening combo attacks from your skills, possession of other characters, and a huge arsenal of weapons, collect all the artifacts, solve the riddles of your erased memory, and find a way out of the ghostly trap, from the shadow of your mind.

name: Ghajini: The Game
summary: Ghajini: The Game is a third-person action game based on the 2008 film Ghajini. It was published in 2008 by FXLabs and Geetha Arts, and distributed by Eros Home Entertainment. It was hailed as India's first true 3D PC game. The game consists of five levels, following the story of the protagonist, Sanjay Singhania (portrayed by Aamir Khan), avenging the death of his girlfriend Kalpana by using martial arts, various weapons, and other artifacts.

name: Ghostbusters Remastered
summary:
This is a complete modification of the US version of Ghostbusters on the NES.

Features:
- Overhauled graphics (99% original. Character sprites and Slimer adapted from The New Ghostbusters 2 on the Famicom).
- Doubled performance on many sections of the game.
- Much improved gameplay/controls everywhere.
- Heavily rebalanced game design.
- Countless bugs fixed.

name: GhostCry Hill
summary: The story follows Liang Suxian, a female university student, who inadvertently becomes entangled in an urban legend. An ancient book transports her back to the campus of the 1950s. Suxian's fate seems inextricably linked to the death of a mysterious girl from the same school.

name: Ghost Rider
summary: The Ghost Rider feature film follows superstar motorcycle stunt rider Johnny Blaze as he strikes a deal with the vile Mephistopheles for the most precious of commodities - his immortal soul. Now Johnny Blaze is forever destined to ride night after night as the host to the powerful supernatural entity known as the Ghost Rider. The video game continues the storyline, dropping players into the role of Blaze as he is transformed into a super hero with powers to avenge any evil he encounters. Featuring many of the characters and motorcycles from the comic book and movie, Ghost Rider engages gamers in an immersive, supernatural third person world with a seamless blend of hand-to-hand combat and high-speed motorcycle action.

name: Ghostbusters II
summary: LCD handheld version by Pack-in-Video. Released in Japan and based on the film of the same name.

name: Ghost of Ice Valley
summary: Ghost of Ice valley is a Visual Novel where you follow multiple different storylines and make choices according to what you believe the characters may do in that situation. Interact in the Interview system to find out more about the characters and about yourself as you go along.

name: Ghost of Fall
summary: "Ghost of Fall" is a 2d side scroller adventure, story driven game with rythm based combat, high quality pixel art and high production value soundtrack.

name: Ghost Knight: A Dark Tale
summary: Ghost Knight: A Dark Tale is a 2.5D action platformer, set in a toon dark fantasy world, where a mad king, in search for immortality, opens portals to a dark dimension. As Ghost Knight, a spirit bound to a suit of armour, you must traverse an epic land of monsters to stop The Mad King.

name: Ghost at Dawn
summary: Explore an abandoned hotel and search for clues while trying not to succumb to your fears in this ode to 90’s survival horror games. You will solve puzzles, face off against supernatural entities, and use limited resources to maintain your sanity so you can explore deeper in The Pines Hotel and find out what really happened to Emi Kosuke.

name: Ghosted
summary: The town of Falling Springs is a dreamy slice of small-town Americana: quiet, beautiful, neighborly, quaint. But within the neighborhood lies a secret of supernatural proportions, and its unveiling will bring your love life back from the dead. Literally.

name: Ghostbusters Arcade
summary: Ghostbusters Arcade is a video redemption game developed by the arcade masters at Play Mechanix for ICE. Players confront ghosts on two levels which are based on events from the first two Ghostbuster films. They then have to stop the Stay Puft Marshmellow man for the chance at a big ticket bonus!

name: Ghostfriend
summary: take care of your ghost friends until they're ready to leave this realm. In ghostfriend, you are in charge of taking care of wayward ghosts who aren't quite ready to leave the mortal realm. watch over them until they grow up and see them off into the afterlife!

name: Ghost Bus Simulator
summary: This is the effect of the elixir of invisibility, which recently affected the city. In this game, you too came under the influence of this elixir without realizing it. But...Life goes on. In this bus simulator game, you as a bus driver, continue to do your job, going from station to station, knowing that people are waiting for you to come.

name: Ghost Bros
summary: Ghost Bros is a 1-4 player co-op ghost investigation game where you and your crew scour the globe for proof of the afterlife...and stream it for profit. Travel to real-life haunted destinations, search for the supernatural, use CPU companions, and build an audience as you risk your health for fame.

name: Ghost Village
summary: My grandmother was originally from the village, but after the environmental disaster that occurred 30 years ago near their settlement, she moved to our city and lived with us.

name: Ghostboy
summary: Would you return from death to help your loved ones through grief? Make fate turning decisions, micromanage the family’s relationships and defeat the negative thoughts on tower defense levels. Watch out, your job will be harder the more severe their mental disorder is.

name: Ghostwage
summary: Ghostwage is a horror game with a focus on tactical action, stealth, and exploration. Explore and hunt down ghosts in linear levels with a unique set of equipment. Complete objectives in each level to take out the Immortal Ghosts, all whilst trying to stay alive.

name: Ghost Cam
summary: Ghost Cam is a spooky exploratory VR and PC game where you search for ghosts – at your own risk… Discover how good you are at finding ghosts, figuring out clues and uncovering the story - if you can survive the multiple endings.

name: Ghost Guy
summary: A short survival adventure game where you play as a ghost exploring an abandoned mansion. There are 11 unique endings to find.

name: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord
summary: Strap on your proton pack and Meta Quest 2 and step into the world of Ghostbusters in immersive virtual reality. Run your Ghostbusters HQ in a new city, San Francisco, and unravel a rich mystery in a new chapter for the Ghostbusters universe.

name: Ghost?
summary: A journey of discovery as a ghost who wakes up on Halloween with no memory of who they are.

name: Ghost Study
summary: You are participating in a study that aims to determine the effects of low-frequency sounds on the human body. Previous studies have shown that these frequencies can cause odd sensations that people attribute to Paranormal Encounters. What will you experience?

name: Gherbert Groundhog in Save the Date
summary:
Gherbert had just got his burrow laid out perfectly for his upcoming date with his sweetheart. Unfortunately his jealous crazy critter neighbours broke in and stole his belongings. With only hours to go until his big date Gherbert must venture outside to find his stuff and get back to tidy up before his date arrives at 8pm.

A traditional retro pixel art platform game. Collect the objects while avoiding the critters before the time runs out!

name: Ghosty Party
summary:
Vaporize as many ghosts of the same color as you can to get a high score, with cute halloween theme animations, bonuses, and sound effects.
The more ghosts you tap at once, the more scores you will get. The more same color ghosts combo, the more scores multiply.

name: Ghost Squad Evolution
summary: Ghost Squad Evolution is a follow up to the 2004 game Ghost Squad. It was released for Lindbergh Red hardware in 2007. Improvements over its predecessor include additional weapons, costumes and more difficulty levels.

name: Ghosting Vandal
summary: A 2D action shooter/hack&slash set in a fantasy land where the gun is law... but so is the blade!

name: Ghost's Timepeices
summary: "There is no Meanings of Time for Ghosts." A new world of ghost and human. A Mysterious Traveler leap the time, travel through the world, solve the puzzle, and chasing the Past...

name: Ghost Reaper
summary: A fast-paced shooter inspired by combining "Doom Eternal" weapons switching combat with "Titanfall" movement mechanics. Set in a sci-fi fantasy post-apocalyptic world.

name: Ghost Killers: The Revenge of the Sucker-Fun
summary: You will not just play... You'll live It...Inspired by the series and the movie mixing Horror and Comedy, Blood and Jockes, with different scenarios and environments.Try to survive the hunt of a spirit that wants to possess you anyway

name: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective
summary: "Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective" was created by Shu Takumi, the creator of the Ace Attorney series, and is now back in a long-requested HD remaster of the original 2010 release!

name: Ghostrunner: Halloween Pack
summary:
The following items included in this pack:

• The Jack-O Sword and Glove Set
• The Shroud Sword and Glove Set
• The Carnivore Sword and Glove Set
• The Night Terro Sword and Glove Set
• The Monstrosity Sword and Glove Set
• The Anomaly Sword and Glove Set

name: Ghostrunner: Winter Pack
summary:
This Winter Pack contains following content:

- 1x Cold Snap Katana
- 1x Cold Blood Gloves

name: Ghostrunner: Neon Pack
summary:
The following items are included in this pack:

• The Afterglow Sword and Glove Set
• The Luminescence Sword and Glove Set
• The Glint Sword and Glove Set
• The Neon Night Sword and Glove Set

name: Ghostrunner: Metal Ox Pack
summary:
The Metal Ox Pack contains following content:

• The Rite Sword and Glove Set
• The Benevolence Sword and Glove Set
• The Justice Sword and Glove Set
• The Integrity Sword and Glove Set

name: Ghost: AC-130 Close Air Support
summary: You are the gunner of the AC-130 Gunship. One of the most lethal war machines ever made. Use your skill with thermal optics and three of the biggest and most lethal guns ever produced to stop the enemy cold. This is a mindless shooter. A game to zone out with. Relax, and destroy.

name: Ghost Blitz
summary: Become a "Ghost Blitz" World Cup Champion! The world-famous game “Ghost Blitz”, played by millions of people, is now available for the smartphone and tablet!

name: Ghosted
summary: Guide the ghosts home by solving color puzzles. After solving color puzzles designed by a unique master, you will soon become a puzzle master too. Oh, and don't miss Master's big band music.

name: Ghosts from the House of Flesh
summary: Ghosts from the House of Flesh is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel art. In the game, you have to collect hidden totems in the forest with ghosts of all kinds.

name: Ghost Hunter
summary: Ghost Hunter - is the simplest 3D shooter with horror elements where you will have to fight with different ghosts!

name: Ghosts over the Water: Changing the Tides of Japan's Future
summary: Ghosts over the Water: Changing the Tides of Japan's Future is an engaging strategy-based, multi-route historical visual novel. It is designed by a team of four undergraduate students associated with University of Texas, Austin's Japan Lab and Epoch Games Initiative.

name: Ghostwire Tokyo: Spider's Thread
summary:
The city’s denizens have been replaced by beings from another world - yōkai, evil spirits, myths and urban legends brought to life. But now isn’t the time to fear the unknown…face it in Ghostwire: Tokyo, now featuring the all-new Spider’s Thread update!

The Spider’s Thread update, available now for all Ghostwire: Tokyo players, adds a new rogue-lite mode to the game on top of other additions to the base campaign, including new enemies, new skills, new areas to explore, new side missions, extended story cinematics, Photo Mode enhancements, new trophies/achievements and more!

name: Ghost Motel 1
summary: Joseph Winter has recently passed away and now must check into the Ghost Motel.

name: Ghostbusters: Dimension
summary: Originally a tie-in to the Ghostbusters reboot film, it featured the ability for visitors to participate in a "hyper-reality" ghost-hunting mission. It was produced and developed by The VOID in collaboration with the respective directors of the original and rebooted film—Ivan Reitman and Paul Feig. The script was written by head writer Tracy Hickman and the experience was directed by Curtis Hickman. Ghostbusters: Dimension marked the first Void attraction outside of Utah. The experience was updated in 2018 to make it available in more locations. The update included an introduction by Ray Stantz (played by Dan Aykroyd) in the pre-show video, as well as the radio voice guide inside the attraction.

name: Ghost Fake
summary: Multiplayer masked action game "Ghost Fake" is an online game where players are divided into the masked ones and survivors to compete against each other. The masked ones use the power of the mask to capture survivors, while survivors use gimmicks to escape!

name: Ghostcon: Elementals
summary: Ghostcon: Elementals is a Sci-fi Action-RPG with choice based dialogue, third person elemental powers, and first person shooting. Will you choose to stay a soldier, rise as a hero, or emerge as a villain?

name: Ghostwriter
summary: Ghostwriter is a singleplayer typing game that pits your words-per-minute against poltergeists who have nothing better to do. Type whatever shows up on the monitor and meet your quota before the time limit. Encounter a variety of ghost types that will interfere in different ways. Buy upgrades and powerups to give yourself an advantage. Improve your words-per-minute and have fun while you are at it!

name: GhostVac
summary: Your own ghost-sucking electromechanical arcade machine at home!

name: Ghost House Pong
summary:
It's Boo-against-Boo in this arcade-style minigame!

- Play Singles or Doubles matches with up to four players.

- Compete across five different courts, each with its own hazards that can be turned on or off.

- Listen to a playlist of classic tracks from the Mario series, as well as other spooky video game tracks.

- USB Controllers are required for doubles matches with 3-4 players.

name: Ghost Blast
summary:
A beautiful match 3 puzzle game starring ghosts!
Leave the dusty halls of an abandoned clock tower to haunt your way through a town in the dead of night! Will you be able to enjoy the ghost and reclaim what has been lost, before the night is over?
Make the most scary combinations and get through challenging levels full of fun! Smash ghost together and match the rarest treats to feed your spiders.

name: Ghostrunner II
summary: Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

name: Ghoul Yeah Bunny
summary: "Ghoul Yeah Bunny" As a treasure hunter stranded on Rabbit Island, solve puppet game puzzles and fight the terrifying Ghoul creature using your trusty lamp filled with rabbit lights. Find the island's 7 hidden treasures and escape to become rich in this suspenseful horror game.

name: Ghost Maze
summary: Embark on this small adventure to conquer a treasure guarded by an iconic character from old games. Find keys to unlock secret passages, face enemies, and explore a labyrinth to discover the game's secrets. Get ready for an epic journey to become the hero who claims the wealth.

name: Ghost Signal: A Stellaris Game
summary: Ghost Signal is a VR action roguelite set in the Stellaris universe, where you captain your ship to battle a multitude of alien species. Partake in dynamic space wars, encounter planet sized creatures, gather valuable loot to conduct research, and more. No journey is the same. Will you find the origins of the mysterious Ghost Signal?

name: Ghost Signal: Fleet Expansion
summary: This free update adds two new ships - the Pandora and the Iris - with unique characteristics, a Relaxed Mode, and an Autosave feature.

name: Ghost Files: Mienai Hannin wo Sagase
Ghosts of Aliens
summary: An RPG maker game in the style of mother 1 by swordofkings128

name: Ghetto Zombies: Graffiti Squad
summary: Expect blasts of green zombie goo painting the screen in this top-down shooter packed with crazy guns that blow the heads off some… freaky zombies. Your mission is simple: graffiti the whole city before these mutants dog-pile you.

name: Ghost and Joker: A thing to do for you
summary: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Ghost Mission
summary: Inspired by stealth-action classics of the past, take control of an elite commando with the ability to turn invisible on a tense adventure where staying out of sight is the best way to stay alive, where the line between truth and fiction is always blurry, and where nothing is ever as it seems.

name: GhostCatcher
summary: Ghost Catcher is a cooperative horror game that can be played by at least 1 and up to 8 players. You need to perform mysterious rituals in a haunted house, confront spirits, identify their true nature, and ultimately capture them.

name: Ghost Simulator
summary: This is the story of a family living in a haunted house in New Hampshire. And you're the one haunting them.

name: Ghostrunner II: Brutal Edition
summary:
Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

Ghostrunner 2 Brutal Edition Includes:
- Ghostrunner 2 Game
- Ahriman's Katana Sword and Hand Skin
- Modern Energy Sword and Hand Skin
- Molten Blade Sword and Hand Skin
- Gothic Blue Sword and Hand Skin
- Hand Hologram with Username
- Aqua Animated Sword and Hand Skin
- Design 24A Motorcycle Skin
- Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass

name: Ghostrunner II: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

Ghostrunner II Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Ghostrunner II Base Game
- Ahriman's Katana Sword and Skin
- Modern Energy Sword and Hand Skin
- Molten Blade Sword and Hand Skin
- Gothic Blue Sword and Hand Skin
- Hand Hologram with Username

name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
summary: Ghouls 'n Ghosts, known as Daimakaimura is a side-scrolling platform game developed by Capcom, released as an arcade video game in 1988 and ported to home platforms. It is the sequel to Ghosts 'n Goblins.

name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
summary: Amstrad CPC port of Ghouls 'n Ghosts.

name: Ghost of Catsushina
summary: Ghost of Catsushina - is an action-adventure platformer. The action takes place on the island, when damage penetrates into the jade dream of the guardian spirit, the warrior awakens and sees that his homeland has been destroyed. Set out on a journey to defeat the filth.

name: GhostBros
summary: Ghost Brothers is a rogue-lite where you control a snake of multiple heroes, each with their own attacks, passive skills, and classes. Inspired by the auto-chess genre, each hero in Snake has a set of classes, and combining enough heroes of the same class can give you additional class bonuses.

name: Ghost in the Brain
summary: A dive into the memories horror game about a painter who paints his drowned sister.

name: Ghostus
summary: A time-warping shooter in which you repeat time and work with your past self to solve puzzles

name: Ghost Hunter
summary: Ghost Hunter is an online collaborative psychological horror game that can be played by at least one and up to five players together. Unlike other ghost hunting games, it incorporates rich Taoist elements and experiences traditional Chinese supernatural culture.

name: Ghost Hand
summary: Ghost Hand is a game focused on combat and exploration, which follows the story of its protagonist, Iria with a non-linear progression. Iria is a young wizard apprentice who lives on the moon. Iria is on the hunt for her father, a long-lost powerful mage, while encountering all sorts of enemies.

name: Ghost Member
summary: 【Ghost Member】is a single-player ghost investigation horror adventure game. You investigate ghosts in a house where a member of the occult research club who went missing was investigating. The story progresses by using multiple items to find traces left by the ghost and identify the type of ghost.

name: Ghost Vanguard
summary: Ghost Vanguard is a Beat'em Up game that combines stylish action with roguelike elements. Grab your sword and step into treacherous evil dungeons, using stylish and magnificent combos to defeat the sinister forces from the darkness!

name: Ghost Tag
summary: It's the classic game of tag, but for ghosts! In this multiplayer party game, you can use spectral super powers like vanishing and possessing objects to gain an edge on your opponents and be the tag champion!

name: Ghost House
summary: A handheld game where you play as a ghosthunter inside a haunted house. Your goal is to kill all the six different ghosts and escape.

name: Ghostbusters II
summary:
Ghostbusters II is a 1990 action game for the NES, developed by Imagineering and published by Activision. It is based on the 1989 film of the same name, and was released in the United States in April 1990, followed by a United Kingdom release in March 1991.

In Europe and Japan, HAL Laboratory released its own Ghostbusters II game called "New Ghostbusters II".

name: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord - Full Containment Edition
summary:
The Full Containment Edition of Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord is set to include the first 6 months of DLC for the game.

The DLC currently includes 4 Equipment Skins, 10 Additional Playable Avatars, the Slimer Hunt feature and collectible with plans for more.

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo 2
summary: An upcoming sequel to Ghostwire: Tokyo. The game was leaked in court documents relating to the FTC v. Microsoft court case.

name: Ghost Mayoker
summary:
This is a game where you use beams and ramming to eliminate approaching ghosts.
As you defeat ghosts, the level increases and becomes more and more difficult.

name: Ghost In The Mirror: Episode 1 - Here Be Dragons
summary: Ghost In The Mirror is an anthology of graphic adventures. A series of ghost stories characterized by a lot of storytelling, puzzles, and wild humor. A collection of modern adventure games that still capture the spirit of the '90s games.

name: Ghost Detective
summary:
You’re a detective who’s been killed on the job. Now as a ghost, your mission is clear: Find hidden objects and solve puzzles to catch your own murderer.
Experience a new hidden object murder mystery crime game set in haunted New Orleans — where life's never boring and dying can get downright complicated.
As a ghost detective, it's up to you to conduct a crime investigation by collecting important clues, looking for hidden objects and solving puzzles. Team up with valuable allies — both living and dead — to solve the mystery of who murdered you... and why.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Ecto Edition
summary: This is an asymmetrical game of hide and seek. In true form to IllFonic's past titles, this title is a 4v1 setup where players will either play as part of a team of new Ghostbusters or a singular Ghost.

name: Ghost Voyage
summary: A young girl who attempts to remove a Lion from her kitchen gets more than she bargained for. A short adventure game.

name: Ghost Seeker Hunter Simulation
summary: Immerse yourself in the dark world of Ghost Seeker - Hunter Simulation, an exciting supernatural adventure. Take on the role of a ghost hunter, exploring abandoned houses in search of spirits. Uncover the secrets of the paranormal, confront your fears, and become a true ghost hunter.

name: Ghost Girl Ghussy: XXXL Edition
summary: Reaching unheard of levels of horniness our protagonist will settle for anything; if it has a hole, that's the goal! So of course, after hearing the urban legend of a giant ghost girl in his neighborhood our would-be ghost hunter hits the streets searching for this sexy specter!

name: Ghost Catchers
summary: It's Halloween night and your school got suddenly haunted by ghosts. Try finding them all and catching them!

name: Ghost Hunters
summary: Ghost Hunters is a cooperative horror game. In which you play as one of 4 ghostbusters. You choose a contract / house where the hell is going on, and you and your team will have to deal with it.

name: Ghost Road
summary: “Ghost Road” is the first installment in the Ghost Road series of games, and is a visual novel game about the myth of ghosts and monsters in the Chinese underworld. The player plays the role of the Ghost Detainer in the underworld to investigate the past deeds of the three female leaders.

name: Ghost Carver
summary: Ghost Carver is a futuristic racer that combines intuitive combat mechanics with exceptional agility to create a highly intense racing experience. Build massive speed with risky maneuvers, fend off other racers with advanced combat techniques, and explore your maximum potential on every track.

name: Ghoul Smash
summary: Ghoul Smash is a turn based physics game similar to Graffiti Smash and Monster Strike where you smash into enemies, fight bosses, and loot items. With simplistic click-and-drag controls you can experience the thrill of smashing enemies into dust while gaining dopamine fueled rewards!

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #1
summary:
The first free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed adds the MOROS Medical Facility map, the Glutton ghost type with 3 new ghosts, 2 new gadgets, the P.K.E. Meter: Ecto-Zapper attachment and the Ghost Swapping option that allows ghosts to change ghost type mid-match.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also adds a set of new customization options with Gear Shells to keep a visual look when using compatible gear, Morph Targets to change a character's face, new suit patches and cork board display in the Firehouse for them.

name: Ghosts of Tabor: Taran Tactical JW3
summary: The Merchant of Death has some new stock, from our partners at Taran Tactical! We bring you four new firearms and one melee weapon, as seen in JW3.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #2
summary:
The second free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the S.C.Y. County Courthouse map, the Possessor ghost type with 3 new ghosts, Trap Minions that can be placed in objects or on the ground and Dredges that can be summoned to help distract the Busters.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics based on the Extreme Ghostbusters Cartoon series, makeup styles with numerous color options, shirt logos for compatible tops, gear tints and new Ghostbuster cosmetics including footwear, a skirt and kilt bottom.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #3
summary:
The third free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the New Motion Club map, the Watcher ghost type with 3 new ghosts and tenure level 4 with some exclusive cosmetics.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics from the 2016 Ghostbusters film, Scar options for face customization, new ghostbuster cosmetics with a summer theme and new tints to use on them.

name: Ghosts of Oblivion
summary: A strategy game in which you need to create a deck of cards and defend against waves of opponents using different tactics by combining them. Armies of evil spirits have attacked our world and you have to fight back the hordes of monsters!

name: Ghosteez
summary: Collect coins and unlock characters with special abilities (characters will come in v1.0) in order to get more coins to discover more ways of levelling up your characters, finding treasures and defending enemies (v1.0 feature)

name: Ghost Eater
summary: third person action RPG with manga inspired graphics

name: Ghostrunner II: Ice Pack
summary: Equip the chilling power of the cybernetic future today with Ghostrunner 2's first DLC, the Ice Pack! Brace yourself for a bone-chilling experience, with a web-inspired twist that will redefine the way you hack and slash through the neon-lit cityscape.

name: Ghosts of Tabor: UWU
summary: The Merchant of Death has some new stock! Prepare to add some kawaii flair to your armory with four weapons and a helmet. Each with varying with vibrant colors!

name: Ghost Only!
summary: 'Ghost Only' is a RTS game of ghost to resurrect ancient demon. Let's defeat the disturbing heroes with the skulls and bring the ancient demon resurrect to create chaos in the world!

name: Ghost Six
summary:
In Hazama Station there has been a strange phenomenon of people disappearing for some time.
Tsutsuji and Sumire will try to solve this paranormal phenomenon in order to repay their debts.

name: Ghost Recon: Heroes Unleashed
summary: Ghost Recon: Heroes Unleashed, the ruthlessly unforgiving tactical shooter experience. True hardcore realism, with nonlinear play, real-world physics, and ultra smart AI. Infinite replayability, with tons of worldwide maps, missions, game types, international special forces units, and a massive arsenal of authentic weapons and equipment.

name: Ghost Party
summary: There is a killer on the loose! In Ghost Party, you play as a lonely ghost who wanders the halls of a haunted mansion to collect random items and help save its various inhabitants from an unknown murderer.

name: Ghost Of Wynlow
summary: An urban explorer ventures out to explore and investigate the legend of the abandoned Wynlow lighthouse.

name: Ghost Janitors
summary: Ghost Janitors is a multiplayer psychological horror game for 1-4 players. Your job? Cleaning haunted houses while avoiding terrifying monsters. Ready to face the spine-tingling challenge with your team?

name: Ghostbane
summary: GHOSTBANE is a game where you act as Paranormal Hunters. Your mission is to identify and neutralize various types of ghosts appearing in different locations. You can try your luck alone, but it's better to work in teams of 2-4 people. Solve this paranormal world using your equipment. Identify the types and beliefs of ghosts. By doing so, you can perform a ritual and trap them. Remember, teamwork and utilizing the strengths of each team member will shape your success. Are you ready, hunters?

name: Ghostrunner Game Bundle
summary:
Experience an electrifying cyber thrill ride with the Ghostrunner Game Bundle, featuring the adrenaline-pumping original Ghostrunner and its highly anticipated sequel, Ghostrunner 2.

With this bundle, you'll unlock high-octane action and breathtaking visuals, immersing yourself in the cutting-edge gameplay that defines the Ghostrunner series. Get ready to run, leap, and slash as you embark on a double-dose of Dharma in this must-have cyber ninja experience.

name: Ghouls Of Divinity
summary: Command a ghoul civilization with an innovative physics-based RTS system, complex AI interactions, and a rich skill tree. Strategy meets divinity in an immersive god game experience.

name: Ghoul League
summary: "Ghoul League" is a doomsday treasure brush shooting game. Any corpse ghost seen in the game can be caught against humans. "Two person game is the future". The game also supports multi person mode. You can break through customs and brush suits with your partners!

name: Ghost legend
summary: This is a racing simulation game with a bicycle themed gameplay,

name: GhostHunt With Triggered Insaan
summary: A Horror Game Featuring Triggered Insaan (Nischay Malhan) as a Ghost Hunter.

name: Ghost Ninja
summary: Ghost Ninja is an action-packed game that puts players in the shoes of a skilled assassin.

name: Ghostbusters
summary: Ghostbusters is an action game that features an overhead-view and a side-view. From Ghostbusters HQ, the player must monitor a map of midtown Manhattan for "ghost alarms", as well as for casual, roaming spirits, and plot a route to the alarmed area. Once the route is plotted, the player then controls the purchased Ghostmobile as it drives through traffic. Here, the player is able to capture casual ghosts on the way if they are en route. When the haunted location is reached, the game switches to a side-view. Two of the Ghostbusters will take position, activate their proton beams, and toss a trap to the ground. The player must then use the two Ghostbusters to attempt to lead the ghost(s) over the placed trap. Once activated, the trap springs to capture any ghosts directly above it. A successful capture will earn the player money, which can then be used to purchase new Ghostbusters vehicles and new modifications for it. An unsuccessful capture will see the ghost fly away (after nastily sliming one of the Ghostbusters).

name: Ghost Master: Complete Edition
summary: Ghost Master: Complete Edition aims to add back all the cut content from the game, including ghosts and levels.

name: Ghost Ascension
summary: Challenge hordes of ghosts, create builds, and unlock permanent upgrades! Ghost Ascension is a 2D rogue-like with a strong progression system. At the end of each wave of enemies, choose the card that best fits your build.

name: Ghost Yantra
summary: "Ghost Yantra" is a hand-drawn 2D Hack ’n' Slash Parkour game set in a branching Indian Cyberpunk city. Embark on a journey as Narak, a gun-for-hire, who after failing to stop a catastrophic event is on a quest for redemption and to fight for his freedom.

name: Ghost Room
summary: Strange phenomena occur one after another in one apartment. You, an exorcist, are asked to investigate and go to the room, but you are trapped by the spirits living in the room. The only way to escape is to suppress all the spiritual phenomena caused by the spirits.

name: Ghostrunner II: Dragon Pack
summary: Celebrate Lunar New Year and pay homage to the majestic year of the Dragon with the second Ghostrunner 2 cosmetic DLC, the Dragon Pack! Unleash ancient symbols of the most vital and powerful beast of the zodiac, seamlessly blending tradition with the cybernetic landscape and beyond.

name: Ghost Hospital: In Thousand Horror Hill
summary: It is a exploration adventure in which the main character roams a magical hospital in search of a friend who has disappeared into another world. The genre is based on a comical atmosphere, with a bit of horror waiting for you deep into the story.

name: Ghost Villa
summary: In Ghost Villa you farm and cook during the day, by night you fight hordes of ghosts that want to haunt and take possession of your home.

name: Ghost Hunter
summary: Ghost hunter is a casual game about hunting ghosts and upgrading your character. Defeat bosses, complete missions, hunt stronger ghosts and play minigames to become the true Ghost Hunter.

name: Ghoul Fort
summary: Ghoul Fort is a mix of RTS and visual novel. Follow the story of a disgraced commander as he tries to feed his people, keep his armies on a leash, and satisfy his own ravenous empire. All the while, another force schemes to unleash hell on the entire system. Forward, into the breach!

name: GHGuessr
summary: GHGuessr is a community game for BastiGHG, in which players have to guess which video it is based on 3 screenshots.

name: Ghost For Hire
summary: Welcome to Ghost for Hire! As the newest hire for the Ghost Protection Management, your job is to drive off mortal trespassers from various protected properties. Use our state-of-the-art equipment to survey the environment, spook the intruders, and scare them into believing in the supernatural!

name: Ghost Gunners
summary: A fun shooter where EVERYONE IS INVISIBLE by default! Use various mechanics to locate other players, and play different game modes with your friends or in public lobbies.

name: Ghost Talker
summary: Have you ever wondered if your house is haunted? With ghost talker you can find out and have conversations with potential paranormal entities.

name: Ghosthero: Shadow of Vengeance
summary: Command your fortress, build defenses, and fight waves of evil. Explore the open world, gather resources, upgrade and finally unleash vengeance on the Titans of Evil. A unique blend of defense, exploration and management. The game is a modern mix of Kingdom and Shadow of the Colossus.

name: Ghost of Viyk
summary: In the lands of Vyik, death is just the beginning. Tailor your items and abilities to create your unique battle style — and slay enemies who never play by the rules, in this Ukrainian Grimfolk roguelite action. Because the price of freedom is never fair.

name: Ghost Moon High Noon
summary: Guide the half-ghost bounty hunter Valentina Sombra through the haunted town of La Enmienda in this western top-down puzzle-shooter. Fire off spectral trick shots and wrangle your environment to put down rowdy spirits and help the grieving townsfolk move on.

name: Ghost Teen Escape from Limbo
summary: Make use of your newfound ghostly abilities to make your way back to the world of the living!

name: Ghost Dance
summary:
David Lynch, filmmaker, artist, and musician, has not made a video game. He certainly did not make this video game. If he were to make one, however, maybe it would be something like this complete conceptual and artistic mess.

In this game you traverse a series of horror scenes directly indebted to Lynch films and artworks cobbled together in an incoherent fever dream. In this world, 'Lynch' is struggling to rebuild his creative world / abstract psychological state and he needs your help. Only you can traverse the inane dreamscape of Lynch's creations and make some sense of the terrible things that are about to be unleashed. But beware: not all is as it seems.

name: Ghostein
summary: Guide a boy, hide him and escape from the Nazi camp using posters! Ghostein is a short stealth game. You control the ghost of the father, who died in the gas chamber, who returns to save his son from the same fate. With the posters you give the command that the boy needs to do.

name: Ghoul Fright
summary: Ghoul Fright is a physics based FPS Survival Beat em up with a 90/2000s cartoon vibe, fight dangerous Ghouls as you cause destruction and chaos in your way while hell unleashes in heated Ghoul waves. ¿Ready to Fright?

name: Ghost Town
summary:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One choice can change everything!
Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where you make the choices and decide the ultimate fate of other people!

name: Ghosts
summary: There is a war in hell too. Two factions of ghosts face each other. Pick your side and bring your army to glory!

name: Ghost Party
summary: Open world RPG inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney. Explore, fight, gather evidence and solve mysteries in a fantasy realm of ghosts & magic. Choose how you Interact with the world & its inhabitants. Fight or logically reason your way out of a battle. The choice is yours.

name: Ghosthunter
summary: Playing the role of a novice policeman, Lazarus Jones, we enter a world full of ghosts and phenomena. In the world of the game belonging to the genre of survival horror horror initiated by the series Alone in the Dark.

name: Ghost
summary: This is a farm themed platform jumping game with simple gameplay but quite cute and interesting.

name: Ghosts in the Garden
summary: In Ghost in the Garden, play as a little cat witch and help the princess catch all the ghosts!

name: Ghost Hunter
summary:
Glenda loves ghosts but no one believes in them except her! Using her trusty shovel and lantern, dig up graves and search for new ghost friends. But be careful -- some graves are cursed!

This game was made for A GAME BY ITS COVER 2023.
The game was based on art created by Gabby DaRienzo.

name: Ghost Whisperer
summary: Ghost Whisperer is brought to you by the marvelous Joss! Equipped with her trusted ghost interpreter, Joss travels across the country to hear what ghosts have on their minds and assist in settling their unfinished business. So if you have a ghost you'd like helped to the other side, give us a call!

name: Ghost Terminal
summary: You are a small ghost on the journey to start his life over again.

name: Ghosts 'n Goblins
summary: A heavily stripped down version of the 1985 arcade platformer, with only two levels and no music.

name: Ghost Party: Nemuri-hime
summary: A ghost is royal road fantasyRPG!!

name: Ghost Light
summary: The ghost Light is a light-spooky, mystery-oriented RPG. You will play as a girl named Mary, exploring dungeons to find escape codes and escape paths in the face of ghosts and traps.

name: Ghost Wave
summary: Ghost Wave is a free space shoot 'em up game.

name: Ghost Story
summary: This game transports you into a charming pixel town brimming with retro appeal.

name: Ghost Keeper
summary: Become a Ghost Keeper and lead your fearsome minions against the living. Use diverse scare tactics, manage demonic creatures and harness dozens of skills. Oh, and don’t let the Brotherhood catch you! The ultimate scaring experience begins…

name: Ghost Jumper: Red Hoodie
summary: "Survive to the end while avoiding terrifying ghosts. "Ghost Jumper is a 2D action casual game where you must survive by avoiding ghosts in the Haunted Forest. Challenge your high score as a cute wolf in a red hood.

name: GhoulScrapers
summary:
Ghoulscrapers is a precision platformer where you play as Eggroll, the new employee at Ghoulscrapers.
You owe the government one gazillion dollars and it's your job to pay the debt before it's too late!

name: Ghostbusters II
summary:
Port of "New Ghostbusters II" for the Game Boy delevoped by HAL Laboratories.

Ghostbusters II is a top-view action game based off of New Ghostbusters II (the second Ghostbusters II license on NES) but with enough differences to be unique. Players begin by choosing two of the four ghostbusters, who all play the exact same. The first one selected is controlled by the player directly and carries a proton pack, the second ghostbuster is follows the first and carries the ghost trap. The objective of each level is to capture a predefined number of ghosts before the timer expires. The player moves up, down, left and right. One button will fire the proton gun directly in front of the first ghostbuster, stunning any ghosts. The second button will toss the trap directly in front of the second ghostbuster, trapping any stunned ghosts. While exploring the levels, any of the 2 remaining ghostbusters (as well as the ghostbusters' accountant Louis) not currently being used will occasionally show up. Touching them will provide power-ups (and often swap with a selected Ghostbuster) including vacuum guns, instant traps and invulnerability.

name: Ghost of Yotei
summary:
The game takes place 300 years after Ghost of Tsushima. Set in the lands surrounding Mount Yōtei, a towering peak in the heart of Ezo, an area of Japan known as Hokkaido in present day.

The area is outside the rule of Japan, and filled with sprawling grasslands, snowy tundras, and unexpected dangers.

name: GhostlyRyokan
summary:
An abandoned inn where lost souls wander, your decision will determine its outcome. The truth about the horror and tragedy hidden in an abandoned ryokan. You step into an abandoned ryokan where ghosts wander about, and you will discover the mystery of a terrible tragedy that occurred in the past. The ghost of a maid who once worked there still wanders the inn and drags visitors into the depths of fear.

Players will be forced to make the ultimate choice: to search through the horror-filled inn and collect hidden clues, or to release the spirit or release the grudge. Will you be able to escape the inn safely?

name: Ghost Frequency
summary: In Ghost Frequency, you are a ghost hunter from PIT - Paranormal Investigation Team. Your mission is to locate a sinister spirit using the EMF Ghost Detector to track paranormal activity, the IR Thermal Camera to reveal hidden entities, and the EVP Digital Recorder to capture eerie voices.

name: Ghost Assassin: Stealth Strike
summary: Embark on a stealthy adventure—eliminate foes, remain invisible.

name: Ghost Hunter
summary: Ghost Hunter is an Atari 400/800 game that puts a unique spin on the classic Pac-Man formula. Set in a haunted mansion on Huckleberry Hill, players control a character tasked with eliminating ghosts by consuming dots in a maze. The game supports both single and simultaneous two-player modes, pitting players against four increasingly aggressive ghosts across 15 pre-designed levels and a random level generator. Ghost Hunter introduces innovative features such as an "instant-hide" ability, allowing players to temporarily vanish to evade ghosts once per life. Additionally, players can collect character fragments scattered throughout the maze to earn extra lives. With its familiar maze-navigation gameplay, power pellets for ghost vulnerability, and progressive difficulty, Ghost Hunter offers a fresh take on the beloved arcade classic while adding its own supernatural twist.

name: Ghunter
summary: GHUNTER is a 3rd person action-adventure, twin-stick shooter game about cooking your prey... ALIVE!!

name: Ghostrunner II: Heat Pack
summary: Experience the searing intensity of Ghostrunner 2 with the third cosmetic DLC, the Heat Pack! Ignite your gameplay experience with three heat-themed katanas and a sizzling motorcycle design as you battle through Dharma Tower and the sun-soaked wastelands.

name: Ghoulie's Garden
summary: Welcome to Ghoulie’s Garden, where Halloween magic awaits!

name: Ghostslayers
summary: Ghostslayers is a wave-based top-down coop shooter where you slay the ghosts with magic and couple thousands of bullets... Or punches, or slashes, or explosions. Use the varied weaponary, spell cards and abilities, combine them together with your allies for more power and get through the city.

name: Ghost Shot
summary: Photographer player goes for the best shot of a ghost at a haunted site. The camera's eye on the ghosts is a deadly risk! Please go to the scene with an open mind.

name: Ghostwriter Workshop
summary: Become a ghostwriter and write on the behalf of others--everything from love letters to apologies! There's just one catch in this crazy adventure game: the most important words in your writings are decided by roulette.

name: Ghost Master: Resurrection
summary: Command an army of specters, unleash terror on the town of Gravenville, and solve puzzles to unlock mysteries in this strategic adventure game of resource management and supernatural mayhem.

name: Ghost Town
summary: Ghost Town is a single player VR puzzle-adventure from the makers of The Room. London, 1983. Edith Penrose is a ghost hunter, busy exorcising her way through the city's restless spirits. But after her brother goes missing Edith must draw upon her wits & supernatural talents to unravel the mystery.

name: Ghost Blast
summary: Ghost Blast is a game where you explore giant stages to find secrets and collectables! Blast off springs, through enemies and even through walls. The more you find before you finish, the higher your RANK!

name: Ghost Sector
summary: Ghost Sector is a survival horror game where you play as M-07, a prototype machine trapped in a cybernetic facility during lockdown. Outwit the automated defenses, search for answers to your origin uncovering secrets, solving puzzles, and upgrade your abilities while preserving your finite energy.

name: Ghost Shooter
summary: Ghost Shooter is a shooting range type microgame where you shoot ghosts that randomly appear on screen. You have 3 lives which you lose if any ghost stays too long on screen. The goal is to score as high as possible.

name: Ghost Kitchen
summary: Online Co-op Cooking game with a twist: some of the chefs are secretly bloodthirsty killers! Play with up to 16 friends, and crack the case before your restaurant becomes… a GHOST KITCHEN

name: Ghost Clicker
summary: A clicker game that hasn't been here before. In the game mode "Thousand Souls" you have to click 1000 times in the shortest time. Or try catching as many souls as possible in endless "Fallen Souls" mode.

name: Ghostie's Escape
summary: Dance with death in this intense dodge-and-survive experience that pushes your reflexes to their limits. Find clues to make your way out of an executioner's chamber where every shadow holds danger.

name: Ghost Invasion: Idle Hunter
summary: Ghost Invasion: Idle Hunter is a mobile idle RPG where players become ghost hunters, capturing spirits that have invaded the world. Developed by Miniclip, the game blends casual idle gameplay with action and RPG mechanics. Players can upgrade their hunter's gear, enhance ghost-catching abilities, and unlock new haunted locations. With each level, stronger ghosts and powerful bosses appear, challenging players to improve their strategy and timing. Featuring atmospheric visuals and a spooky soundtrack, the game offers a hauntingly fun experience for fans of idle and casual RPGs.

name: Ghost Hunters: Collector's Edition
summary: Capture ghosts in a tech-infused world full of mysteries and adventures.

name: Ghost Witch: Soulstice Sprint
summary: In this one-off holiday themed time trial, platform around as Esme the Ghost Witch and help the citizens of Terror Mountain reclaim their offerings in time for the Soulstice celebration!

name: Ghost of Boarding School
summary:
Forced to change jobs from fortune teller to exorcist!?
A fake fortune teller with zero spiritual sense continues investigating the academy today...

name: Ghost Room Deep
summary: You go to solve a ghostly phenomenon, and a number of horrors strike you... , I recommend this to those who are looking for a direct horror story!

name: Ghost Shock
summary: Switch roles between heroes and monsters to fight, become the embodiment of justice or let evil rule, everything is possible.

name: Ghost In The Grid
summary: A short cyberpunk story about a security technician investigating a system outage in a city sector cut off from the network. The deeper he ventures into the digital underworld, the darker the truths he uncovers...

name: Ghouls & Guardians
summary: Ghouls & Guardians is a tower defense and strategy game with roguelite elements. Build and manage your defenses, gather resources, and fend off relentless night creatures. Each playthrough encourages creative tactics and offers a fresh, challenging experience.

name: Ghost Deliverer
summary: One day, A girl accidentally gets involved with the 'KEA (Korean Exorcist Association)' and the evil organization 'Lunacide'... Will be able to stop Lunacide's plot and be reborn as a proper exorcist?

name: Ghost Golfing
summary: Swing on to Ghost Golfing. Build haunting mini golf courses to ricochet, blow, burn or teleport the ball right in to the hole!

name: Ghost Infinite Labyrinth
summary: You have wandered into a Japanese labyrinth where ghosts lurk. Escape from this strange space while running away from the ghosts.

name: Ghost Story
summary: A short, modern horror story.

name: Ghost Traveler: Adventures in Edo
summary: A Time loop mystery set in Japan’s Edo period!

name: Ghost Jukebox
summary:
Take a seat, relax, and boo-gie your way into a happy afterlife in this cozy rhythm game! You're a ghost in purgatory helping lost souls move onto the afterlife with the power of music therapy!

All of your clients have a story. Some are good, some are bad, but all of them are packed with emotion. It’s up to you to use the power of music to help these lost souls move forward!

To help your patients, you’ll have to play some music on your trusty jukebox! Point, click, and hold the left mouse button to play the right notes.

After you’re done…why not explore your room a little? Sometimes, it’s good to unwind and take a breather after such an emotional session.

name: Ghost Castle: Gengar's Love Quest
summary: Ghost Castle: Gengar's Love Quest is a BL visual novel with three separate routes, over 50 unique CGs, and a fully functioning sprite and CG gallery. Explore the castle through the eyes of Gengar, a charming ghost who is eager to learn all about the residents (especially the cute ones!).

name: Ghostmoons: Arcade
summary: Ghostmoons - Arcade, is a vehicle based first person shooter, focusing on rapid movements or strafing, to avoid projectiles and attacks. Your goal is to remove the unknown military's portals from the moons of the Ghostmoons system, while avoiding collateral damage of the native life forms.

name: Ghost Haunting
summary: GHOST HAUNTING is a humorous 2D point-and-click adventure in wonderfully low resolution. A loving tribute to the graphic adventures of the 90s - with the best of then and the comfort of today. Grinsemuskelkater guaranteed (no liability for permanent damage)!

name: Ghost Hunters
summary: Ghost Hunters: a game about a hereditary medium who, despite being unable to sense the otherworldly, agrees to a mysterious contract to capture ghosts!

name: Ghost of the Diced Steak
summary: This is a game where you control a diced steak and aim for the goal located deep within each stage. But it's not just any diced steak. This steak has the power to create ghosts. These ghosts replicate your past actions and can be strategically used to overcome obstacles.

name: Ghost Code: Ignite
summary: Ghost Code: Ignite will be a twin-stick shooter with weapons to collect and a dense city to explore.

name: Ghost Code: Escape
summary: Collect pets and explore 18 handcrafted levels as you uncover a small part of the world of Ghost Code.

name: Ghlobot Shift
summary: Ghlobot Shift is a charming space adventure where glowing little Ghlobots journey across 7 unique universes to reclaim their stolen stars and rescue their queen from the Demon King. Explore 35 handcrafted levels and face off against 7 epic bosses in glowing, otherworldly environments.

name: Ghost Gunners
summary: This party FPS is made to CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS, up to 6 people! Everyone is invisible, but you have various tools to track and reveal enemies. Play different game modes and customize your lobbies.

name: Ghost HQ
summary: In this new action-packed, team-based action game, you are the boss of Ghost HQ, a team of elite ghost hunters. The Town of Dunville has been invaded by the supernatural. Ghosts spread like flies, possessing furniture and turning it into strange and unexpected enemies. Boss monsters have spawned in attics and cellars, turning normal homes into spooky spectacles and dungeons of danger! Ghost HQ never sleeps, as new infestations pop up across town. It’s up to you to keep the beasts at bay.

name: Ghost Feed
summary: This is a game inspired by the creator's real-life experiences and insights. The protagonist arrives in an old town and encounters strange, supernatural events in a spooky mansion. Ultimately, he discovers a deep connection between himself and the people and events within the mansion...

name: Ghost Gang
summary: Ghost Gang is a co-op beat’em up where you play as a ghost in a small town. Your power of possession is your greatest weapon against evil spirits taking over the town's residents. Use it to your advantage and save the town in your own way!

name: Ghost Hunter Simulator
summary: Build your own Ghost Hunting social media empire in Ghost Hunter Simulator - the only game that let's you decide if ghosts are real or not! A cozy game about exploring *allegedly* haunted locations and learning the local history and lore.

name: Ghostrunner II: Endless Moto Mode
summary: Enter the adrenaline-fueled arena of Ghostrunner 2's Endless Moto Mode where players are thrust into the depths of the cybervoid and speed reigns supreme. Survive this treacherous motorcycle ride as long as you can and push the limits of velocity.

name: Ghostrunner II: Anniversary Pack
summary:
Celebrate one year of Ghostrunner 2 with the final Ghostrunner 2 DLC, the Anniversary Pack! Complete your katana collection with three all-new swords, paired with 3 flashy hand skins, and a sleek new motorcycle skin to slash and speed your way through the cybervoid.

The Anniversary Pack includes the following in-game cosmetic skins:

S4FETY VE5T Sword and Hand Skin
BL4CK P3ARL Sword and Hand Skin
N3XT LEV3L Sword and Hand Skin
Design Ghost Motorcycle Skin

As an added celebratory gift, all Ghostrunner 2 game owners will receive the following Sword, Hand, and Motorcycle skins free:

ONE MORE LEVEL Sword and Hand Skin
Design ONE MORE LEVEL Motorcycle Skin
Bloodstained Blue Rose Sword and Hand Skin

name: Ghostrunner II: Season Pass
summary:
Each cosmetic pack contains 3x Sword Skins, 3x Hand Skins, and 1x Motorcycle Skin. That’s 28 unique skins! Buy the Season Pass today and lock in all the Ghostrunner 2 post-launch DLC content for less!

Buy the Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass to lock-in all 4 cosmetic DLC packs including the Ice Pack, Dragon Pack, Heat Pack, and Anniversary Pack, plus the highly anticipated Endless Moto Mode for less.

The Ice Pack, Dragon Pack and Heat Pack are now available and included in the Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass.

Season Pass is included as part of the Ghostrunner 2 Brutal Edition.

name: Ghosts of Trastevere
summary:
In this brief journey through memories and legends, walking through the quiet alleys of Trastevere and the shadows of Piazza Trilussa, a man recalls what his grandfather told him about the ghosts of Rome.

From the haunting of Beatrice Cenci to the mysterious monk of San Pietro in Vincoli, each step crosses the fine line between reality and myth, between life and the eternal echo of the city.

A short walking simulator about the hidden soul of Rome, where beauty and mystery merge into an immersive and contemplative experience.

name: Ghost Ripper
summary: In Ghost Ripper, you play as Heather, a night-shift waitress abducted and held captive in an abandoned asylum by the infamous and sadistic serial killer known as the Ghost Ripper. Hide, survive, and uncover his dark past as you search for a way out.

name: Ghostly Acres
summary: Ghostly Acres is an idle hotel management game that lets you play at your own pace. Build, collect, upgrade, and grow an old house into a thriving inn for ghostly travelers.

name: GhosTrick-The Sacred War of Light vs. Shadow
summary: Short Description A strategic board game where angels and demons clash through hidden identities and mind games. Three intertwined win conditions create a new story and challenge with every match.

name: Ghost with a Gun
summary: Escape to Fort Lockwood - a stylish and secure location with strong defenses and an emphasis on safety. Bring your own firearms or borrow ours to practice your marksmanship in your very own indoor gun range.

name: Ghouli Hunter
summary: From the Creators of Ghouli Hunter, join Hunter Ghouli the Ghouli Hunter on a tour to clear through the cursed manor. Will you be able to help Hunter? Or is he destined to become one of those pesky poltergeist? Use your mouse to shoot ghoulies to earn points and stay alive as long as possible

name: Ghost Shooter
summary: A shooting game in which the player defends the city while defeating ghosts summoned by rituals with a gun that can purify them. The player becomes a girl (Ghost Shooter) with a gun that can purify ghosts, and fights to the death against ghosts and monsters that are approaching the city.

name: Ghosts of the Past: Bones of Meadows Town - Collector's Edition
Ghostprint
summary: Atmospheric first-person horror game where you carry an old Polaroid camera. Take the right picture and a way forward emerges.

name: Ghost Dragon III
summary: Hack'n'Slash in forgotten world.

name: Ghostly Whiskers
summary:
Your beloved human has vanished into the night. As a pair of courageous cats, you’ll follow their scent to an abandoned mansion shrouded in fog and mystery. But this is no ordinary house — it’s alive with whispers, shadows, and secrets from the past.

Ghostly Whiskers is a short but unforgettable co-op (or solo) adventure that blends light horror with heartwarming moments. Solve puzzles, explore eerie rooms, and use your feline instincts — like squeezing through tight spaces, climbing ledges, and sniffing out hidden clues — to uncover the truth.

name: Ghost Car
summary: A top-down platformer where you play as Ghar, a ghost that has possessed a car to break out of a prison.

name: Ghost Scout
summary: Identify invisible ghosts using mundane and strange objects. Find the Anchor without getting killed, reveal the ghosts true form and attempt to get out alive.
